name: Til We Can Hold Hands Without Fear
name_original: Til We Can Hold Hands Without Fear
description:
Version 0.9 (1.0 is coming on 4/11 with music updates and finished scripting) - Made for Nanoreno 2023

Decades ago, vampires and humans made a peace treaty after centuries of bitter fighting. However, the key to the peace treaty, the vampire princess, went missing and the war resumed with no end in sight. 

When Soraya, the vampire princess, wakes up after decades in a coma, Zuberi, a vampire hunter refuses to kill her. Their journey to restore peace (and maybe find love along the way) begins here.

Game contains:

  • PG-16 content
  • Female protagonist and male love interest
  • ~3.5k words of linear story

Made by:

  • Zedie (Writer)
  • Syd (Editor)
  • Akua (Sprite, CG and Logo Artist)
  • Ley (Programmer)

Special thanks to:

  • Pumpkin Spike(Sprite silhouette asset)
  • Usarin
  • Garbledmess

Music Credits:
